unnormalised: Good news for those thinking of going solar! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) just announced some sweet deals on rooftop solar installations before Diwali. Apparently, the "Surya Ghar: Muft Bijli Yojana" is gaining traction, and they're boosting subsidies to encourage more folks to jump on the bandwagon.
normalised: Good news for those thinking of going solar! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) just announced some sweet deals on rooftop solar installations before Diwali. Apparently, the "Surya Ghar: Muft Bijli Yojana" is gaining traction, and they're boosting subsidies to encourage more folks to jump on the bandwagon.

unnormalised: Think of it - cutting down your electricity bill AND doing your bit for the environment. Win-win! Subsidies can cover up to 40% of the installation cost for systems up to 3 kW, bringing the initial investment down significantly. For larger systems (3-10 kW), the subsidy scales down a bit but still provides substantial relief.
normalised: Think of it - cutting down your electricity bill and doing your bit for the environment. Win-win! Subsidies can cover up to forty percent of the installation cost for systems up to three kilowatt, bringing the initial investment down significantly. For larger systems (three to ten kilowatt), the subsidy scales down a bit but still provides substantial relief.

unnormalised: Heard Mr. Sharma from Bangalore saved almost Rs. 50,000 on his 5kW setup. Enough for a lifetime supply of biryani, right? And with summer around the corner, you’ll be thanking yourself when the AC’s blasting and your bill isn’t giving you heart palpitations. Check out your local discom's website for details and eligibility criteria. Don't miss out; this Diwali, light up your home with the sun!
normalised: Heard Mister Sharma from Bangalore saved almost rupee fifty thousand on his five kilowatt setup. Enough for a lifetime supply of biryani, right? And with summer around the corner, you’ll be thanking yourself when the A C’s blasting and your bill isn’t giving you heart palpitations. Check out your local discom's website for details and eligibility criteria. Don't miss out; this Diwali, light up your home with the sun!
